title: Welcome!
name: I'm Darian Harrop-Williams
pitch: I build systems that work, defend networks that matter, and keep learning along the way.
bio: I've always been an engineer. Whether it's a trail, a project, or a challenge, I’m drawn to solving it one step at a time.

tenets.title: Start Small, Build Strong
tenets.description: Big outcomes begin with careful, focused steps.

tenets.title: Balance Stability and Growth
tenets.description: Solid structures must adapt without losing their integrity.

tenets.title: Listen to Results
tenets.description: Every outcome — good or bad — is feedback for the next move.

tenets.title: Design for Change
tenets.description: Solutions should be able to grow and shift without breaking.

tenets.title: Simplify with Purpose
tenets.description: True simplicity strengthens; it never strips away what matters.

tenets.title: Build for Resilience
tenets.description: Expect disruptions. Engineer strength without brittleness.

tenets.title: Solve Beyond the Immediate
tenets.description: Think past the first version — design for lasting impact.

tenets.title: Respect the Hidden Forces
tenets.description: Unseen feedback loops, limits, and shifts shape every project.

quotes: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. – Leonardo da Vinci
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity. – Albert Einstein
The best way to predict the future is to invent it. – Alan Kay
Not all those who wander are lost. – J.R.R. Tolkien
What you do makes a difference. You have to decide what kind of difference you want to make. – Jane Goodall
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm. – Winston Churchill
Creativity is intelligence having fun. – Albert Einstein
The obstacle is the way. – Marcus Aurelius
If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together. – African Proverb
Fall seven times, stand up eight. – Japanese Proverb
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. – Wayne Gretzky
Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. – Nelson Mandela
Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again. – Richard Branson
Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth. – Pablo Picasso
It always seems impossible until it’s done. – Nelson Mandela
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all. – Helen Keller
Well done is better than well said. – Benjamin Franklin
A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for. – John A. Shedd
The only way out is through. – Robert Frost
If you are working on something exciting, it will keep you motivated. – Steve Jobs
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. – Sam Levenson
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value. – Albert Einstein
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. – Mark Twain
You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have. – Maya Angelou
Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree. – Martin Luther
There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self. – Ernest Hemingway
I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions. – Stephen Covey
If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced. – Vincent Van Gogh
The journey is the reward. – Chinese Proverb
The more I practice, the luckier I get. – Gary Player
Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise. – Frank Ocean
There’s a crack in everything, that’s how the light gets in. – Leonard Cohen
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones. – Confucius
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit. – Aristotle
Dreams don't work unless you do. – John C. Maxwell
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see. – Henry David Thoreau
The mind is everything. What you think you become. – Buddha
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will. – Suzy Kassem
Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own. – Bruce Lee
Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away. – Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Everything should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler. – Albert Einstein
You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems. – James Clear
Great things are done by a series of small things brought together. – Vincent Van Gogh
Stay hungry, stay foolish. – Steve Jobs
You become what you give your attention to. – Epictetus
Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see. – Arthur Schopenhauer
We are all apprentices in a craft where no one ever becomes a master. – Ernest Hemingway
Hard choices, easy life. Easy choices, hard life. – Jerzy Gregorek
If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough. – Albert Einstein
An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field. – Niels Bohr
